biotools.summary: This is developed for designing a single-strand RNA sequence with desired immunomodulatory potentials in order to develop RNA-based therapeutics, immunotherapy and vaccine-adjuvants. This server also facilitates the users in computer-aided designing of siRNAs with desired toxicity.

bioschemas.name: imrna
